language.phrase: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

Please enter valid username and password
Username and/or email address did not match to the database.
Sorry don't have valid privileges to access this page.
Sorry, no listings found under this criteria.
Please do not change values between [ ]
Password must contain at least one lower case letter, one upper case letter and one digit.
Your password did not match the confirmed password!.
Password sent successfully. Please check your email
In order to reset your password, please enter the email address above, you used to register your account.
Leave it empty unless changing the password.
Password must be at least 6 characters long.
Please complete the following required fields:
Please complete all of the required fields
Username Is Too Short (less Than 4 Characters Long).
Sorry, This Username Is Already Taken
We are sorry, selected username does not exist in our database
Here you can view your site latest statistics as well as other important inforation.
You've done a toal of [NUMBER] sales up to date.
You've done a toal of [NUMBER] in revenue up to date.
Only Active or Published listings will be visible on front page.
Please select at least one listing.
Selected web special (s) have been deleted successfully.
Set manual expiration date regardless of membership.
Featured Listings have better visual impact than normal listing
Illegal Image type. Only .jpg or .png allowed
Illegal file type. It does not appear to be an image.
Here you can manage your car listings.
Here you can update your car listings.
Here you can add a new listing.
Here you can view current month listing summary.
Here you can view and manage pending listings. Approve/Reject will also notify user of listing status. Grayed out listings are marked as rejected

Specify unique Meta description, or leave it empty for a system generated description. A meta description is a brief summary of the current page. It may be used by search engines when they display search results containing your website.
Specify unique Meta keywords, or leave it empty for a system generated keywords. Keywords will be automatically generated based on your listing description.
If left empty, it will be automatically generated based on listing Make and Model.
You don't have any listings yet. Please add...
This field is used for internal purposes only. Content entered here will be visible in this section only.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty, it will be automatically generated based on listing Year-Make-Model
This is one of your users/dealers
Enter vehicle VIN and press search icon.
Here you can view summary of the information available for this web special.
You have successfully activated [NAME] listing package.
You cannot delete main Owner account!
Here you can update your personal account information.
Here you can update your staff member's profile.
Here you can add new staff member.
Here you can view account statistics such as customer registrations and demographics.
Here you can manage your site staff members roles and privileges.
Here you can view and manage privileges for currently selected [ROLE] role.
Click on Access label to grant/deny access options.
Here you can view and manage your staff members such as admins and editors.
No staff members found under this criteria.
Send welcome email to this user
Leave it empty unless changing it.
Member = Normal user, Dealer = Will not have to pay for any listings. Use it only when adding your own listings.
Comments are for internal purposes only.
Set membership expiry date regardless of membership default date.
Here you can add new member.
Here you can view and manage your members.
Here you can view details for currently selected member.
Here you can update currently selected member's profile.
Here you can view currently selected member's activity.
Here you can view listings for currently selected member.
No activity found for selected user.
No members found under this criteria.
No listings found for this member.
You can manually assign membership to current user, without the need of payment.
Here you can view and manage country list.
Here you can update currently selected country properties.
Here you can update settings for currently selected country.
You don't have any countries yet...
Here you can view and manage list of banned IP's and Email addresses.
You don't have any ban items yet...
Here you can manage your car features. To reorder feature click and drag item [ICON] position it where you want it. Order will be saved automatically. Click on a feature name to edit.
You don't have any features yet. Please add...
Here you can manage your car makes. Click on model title to edit. Note: Deleting Car Make will also delete all models assigned under the same.
Please select car make from the list.
You don't have any makes yet. Please add...
Here you can manage your car models. Click on model name to edit. To add more models, first select Car Make from Car Make List, then click on add button.
Please enter at least one Model Name
You don't have any models yet. Please add...

Here you can manage your dealership locations.
Here you can update your dealership location.
Here you can add a new dealership location.
You don't have any locations yet. Please add...

Type your exact address into map search field. Once location is found, you can drag and move location pin to mark precise location of your dealership. Zoom level will also be saved along with your location on the map.
Here you can manage your categories.
You don't have any categories yet. Please add...

Here you can add new body type category.
Title appearing in browser navigation bar. If left empty, it will be automatically generated based on category name.
Here you can update your gateway settings.
When in live mode all transactions will be processed in real time
Only active gateways will be available for payment methods.
IPN Url might be needed for some gateways when recurring payments are involved.
Here you can manage your list of available gateways.
Your are missing all gateways. You need to reinstall them manually
Only active packages will be available for purchase.
If selected, items under this package will be listed as featured items
Here you can update your listing package.
Here you can add new listing package type.
Here you can manage your listing packages. Note: Make sure you are not deleting or deactivating packages assigned to active users.
Number of listings allowed under this package.
Sorry there was an error activating your package. Please contact the administrator!
You don't have any package packages yet...
Period before package expires. Valid values are: up to 30 Day(s), up to 90 Week(s) up to 52 Month(s) up to 5 Year(s)
Private packages are not available to front end users.
Enter your currency such as CAD, USD, EUR
Directory where Car Dealer Pro is installed
Here you can view and manage important aspects of your site configuration options.
Additional info to appear on invoice besides standard ones.
Locales are used for displaying dates in your own language format.
Illegal file type. Only jpg and png file types allowed.
If no logo exists, Company Name will be used instead
Use PHP Mailer or SMTP protocol for sending emails
Emaill address used for receiving notifications
Show news announcement on home page
Default number of items used for pagination
Default number of search results used for pagination
Number of days listing is visible on SOLD status
Ask your hosting company for sandmail path if unsure. Usually: /usr/sbin/sendmail -t -i
Mail server port ( Can be 25, 26. 456 for GMAIL. 587 for Yahoo ). Ask your host if uncertain.
Choose Yes if your server requires SSL connection
If Yes, taxes will be applied, based on user country.
Your vin Google map api key
This is the main email notices will be sent to. It is also used as the from 'email' when emailing other automatic emails

Here you can update your menu items.

Use the form below to create a new menu (such as a navigation menu of web pages) which can then be displayed on your web site. Drag and drop items to change their positions on the tree. Click on a menu name to access edit options. Click on [DEL] to delete.
Enter full url starting with http://
The name of the menu will appear in navigation.
This menu will link to Following: Content Page and External Link
Here you can manage your f.a.q. To reorder questions click and drag question [ICON] position it where you want it. Order will be saved automatically.
Here you can update your f.a.q..
Here you can add new f.a.q.
You don't have any f.a.q. yet. Please add...
This is the code that will be used to apply discount on total cart amount.
This is your discount amount. Enter numeric values only
Here you can manage your discounts/coupons.

Select one or more membership to apply discount code to it. Private memberships are excluded.

Here you can manage your listing image gallery. Click on image caption to edit. To reorder images click and drag handle [ICON] position it where you want it. Order will be saved automatically.
You don't have any images yet. Please upload.
Here you can update your language phrases. Note: Do not replace variables between [ ]. Click on Value name to edit.
There was an error creating backup.

Make sure your database is backed up frequently. Click on Create backup to manually backup your database. The backups are stored in the [/admin/backups/] folder and can be downloaded from the list below. Your most recent backup is highlighted. Make sure you download your most recent backup, and delete the rest.
Are you sure you want to restore database?

The information displayed below is collected from a variety of locations, and summarized here so that you may be able to conveniently find some of the information required when trying to diagnose a problem or request help with your [NAME] installation.
Total of [NUMBER] banned users deleted successfully.
This will delete all [BANNED] banned user(s).

This will delete all users (not administrators), who have not logged in to the site within a certain time period. It will not delete users pending verification process. You specify the days spent inactive
Here you can perform site maintenance, such as deleting inactive and banned users, image resizing etc... Be careful what you doing, these actions can not be undone.

Shrink the image to the specified size while maintaining proportion of width or height. If you have lots of images, you should put your site offline, as it might take some time until all images are being processed.
There was an error creating sitemap.xml. Make sure filename [FILENAME] exists and is writable!
Here you can create site map in xml format, that you can submit to your search engine for better ranking. We recommend you regularly update your sitemap.
Invalid file extension. Allowed extensions are:
Sorry but there is an error on our server. Please try again later.
File is too big. Maximum allowed size is
An unexpected error occurred, please try again later
Sorry but there is an error on our server. Please try again later.
The file could not be uploaded
Please note, once listing is submitted it will need to be reviewd before becoming published.
Thank you! Your listing is now published and active. You can view it here [URL]
Thank you! Your listing inactive pending our verification proccess. Once approved, you will be notified.
Your membership has already expired, or the number of active listings is at maximum. You will need to renew it, or delete some of the listings in order to add more.

We use cookies to improve your experience on the website. Some cookies are required to ensure that the site functions correctly, for this reason we may have already set some cookies. Other cookies gather anonymous data about how you are using the website, however these will only be set if you give your consent.
In doing so you will be redirected. Do you wish to proceed?
Looks like the page you're looking for was moved or never existed.
Make sure you typed the correct URL or followed a valid link.
If you typed in the address, check your spelling. Could just be a typo
If you've found an issue with one of our websites, we’d appreciate it if you could report the problem. One of our developers will take a look at it as soon as possible
If you followed a link, it's probably broken.
If you're not sure what you’re looking for, start at [NAME].
Stay tuned for news and updates
